1.12.2.2.1.1:
- Supporters list is now fetched on a separate thread
- Updated chinese translations (courtesy of Determancer)
1.12.2.2.1.0:
- Added Dark Offspring Head
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.6
1.12.2.2.0.5:
- The model (and item textures) for the Lesser Shoggoth heads has been updated (courtesy of Cybercat5555)
- The eyes on the Lesser Shoggoth heads now glow like they do on the mobs
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.4.15
1.12.2.2.0.4:
- Bosses, Coralium Infested Squids and Remnants now drop their respective heads
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.4.11
1.12.2.2.0.3: - Actually applied the fix for the startup crashes with Thaumcraft
1.12.2.2.0.2: - No longer causes startup crashes when loaded alongside Thaumcraft
1.12.2.2.0.1:
- Mobs now drop their respective heads (apart from the bosses and Coralium Infested Squids, who all lack loot tables)
- Added a left-handed Fist of Cha'garoth
- Compressed the texture files
- The heads now work as Thaumcraft infusion stabilizers
- The heads no longer show up in all creative tabs
1.12.2.2.0.0:
- Added Evil Sheep Head
- Added Demon Sheep Head
- Added Coralium Infested Squid Head
- Removed the End Abyssal Zombie Head
- All heads are now placeable blocks
